name: cosp.in
overview:
Cosp.In is a cost-effective and easy-to-use collaborative technology platform which helps enterprises to leverage the power of social medias to find and connect with customers on social web.

With Cosp.in, global brands, small businesses and marketing agents can manage social networks efficiently by running marketing campaigns, monitoring social conversation and co-develop their brand with customers.

Top Features

Support to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and Google Buzz

Connect to unlimited social networks

Post Marketing Campaigns across Facebook, Twitter, Linked In and Google Buzz

Track Campaigns with powerful dashboards

Group Multiple Social Networks and post campaigns in single click

Find your customers social profiles

Monitor and Participate in Social Conversation

7 ways to use Cosp.in

  1. Find your customers social presence

Ever wonder where your customers spent time on social medias? do you know how many percentage of your customers on Facebook or Twitter? How many of your clients have LinkedIn profile? You can only have a good social media strategy if you know where most of your customers spent time on social web. Use cosp.inâ€™s social insight lens to scan your customers social presence.

  1. Identify the most influential customers

Find out your customers social profile, and find out the most influential customers. Knowing your customers social profiles is like knowing the personality of each of your customers. Use cosp.in to find out your customerâ€™s social connections and see how you can tap them into your social medial marketing strategy.

  1. Post marketing campaigns on social medias

Do you have new product launch planned? or do you want to let your customers know about the highlights of your service? or do you want to increase customer loyalty? Use cosp.in to run marketing campaigns across Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and google buzz.

  1. Track campaign performance across the social web

Track marketing campaigns across the social web and see who is bringing you more clicks. Cosp.in is integrated with bit.ly, so the links that you post via cosp.in will automatically be shortened for you to track.

  1. Review your social feeds at one central place

Do you have account in more than one social networks? and do you logon to each one of them separately to see the feeds from your friends/followers? Use Cops.in to see all your social feeds in one central place.

  1. Participate in social conversation

Your customers talk about lot of stuffs, birthdays, weekend parties, favorite movies or sometime it may be about your product /service. Use Cosp.in to be part of your customers conversation.

  1. Share your product / service features with customers

Use Cosp.In to find a appropriate social conversation to pitch about your product/service. You can also send quick tit bits about your product across Facebook, Twitter, Linked and Google Buzz in a fraction of seconds.
